turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to order three pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, no no. I'd like it to be small. I'm, sorry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me correct that. 3 small pizzas. what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one to be pepperoni and ham. And then the other, I would like it to be.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, is there like a Hawaiian style pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, hawaiian pizza is available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, yeah. Then one on that, and then I would like a meat lover's pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And a gluten free crust on all the three pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say you want thick crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I would like a gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: on all 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, any special instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 3 small pizzas. one pepperoni and ham, a hawaiian and a meatlovers, is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and all 3 pizzas are gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, thanks for confirming that. your total is $51.36.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you and enjoy!
